wordGroup: pounce on 猛扑向；突然袭击

sentences.en: The lion crouched ready to pounce.
When cats are preparing to pounce they creep over the ground very slowly.
sentences.cn: 当猫准备猛扑时，它们在地上爬得很慢。

sentences.en: His fingers are hooked softly round the table-end, like a cat about to pounce.
sentences.cn: 他的手指靠着桌沿略微蜷曲，看似一只要猛扑上去的猫。
